short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cash Back Online Shopping! How? Companies pay us to send you their way.  We give 50% back to you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Pinchcart™, the ultimate spending companion that revolutionizes the cash back shopping online! Our innovative browser extension effortlessly tracks your spending across our vast network of affiliate websites, ensuring you never miss out on valuable cash back opportunities.

Key Features:

    NEW: Coupon codes:  Coupon Codes are now listed under the cash back active display.  While shopping make sure to click the shopping extension icon to see if we found coupons.

    Seamless Tracking: Our extension works seamlessly in the background, automatically monitoring your purchases at our affiliate websites without any extra effort on your part. Say goodbye to manual tracking and hello to effortless savings!

    Cash back Updates: Receive notifications about cash back opportunities as you browse and shop. Stay in the loop and maximize your savings with up-to-the-minute updates on available cash back percentages.

    Wide Affiliate Network: We've partnered with a diverse range of top-notch affiliate websites, ensuring that you can enjoy cash back rewards across a variety of brands and products. From fashion and electronics to travel and lifestyle, our extensive network has you covered.

    User-Friendly Interface: Our extension is designed with you in mind. Enjoy a user-friendly interface that makes navigating and utilizing the features a breeze. Whether you're a tech guru or a casual shopper, our product is tailored to suit your needs.

    Secure and Private: Rest easy knowing that your personal and financial information is secure. Our extension prioritizes user privacy and employs top-notch security measures to safeguard your data.

How It Works:

    Install the Extension: Easily add our extension to your browser of choice with a quick installation process.

    Shop as You Normally Would: Continue shopping at your favorite affiliate websites that is in our network just as you always do.

    Enjoy Automatic Tracking: Let the extension do the work for you, tracking your spending and identifying cash back opportunities.

    Collect Your Rewards: Once your cash back accumulates, simply redeem your rewards hassle-free. It's that easy!

Start Saving Today:

Transform your online shopping experience with Pinchcart™. Say goodbye to missed cash back opportunities and hello to effortless savings. Install our extension now and let the rewards roll in as you shop at our network of affiliate websites!
